name: Astrorite
description:
Short Description

Fight and get your planet back! Astrorite is a retro metroidvania game,with you being an astronaut who lost his planet when attacked by the aliens,and have to fight to get everything back! Win all the way up to the final boss and take your revenge from the enemies who invaded your home!

Features

  • At least 2 hours of game play.
  • Simple puzzle elements.
  • 3 different planets.
  • Inventory and secret shops with new weapons.
  • 6 unique boss fights.

Controls

  • Movement : Arrows/A-D
  • Shoot: Tab/ Q / R/ LMouse Button
  • Hover: Z / Space / LShift
  • Crouch: LControl / RControl
  • Look Up: W/Up Arrow
  • Melee Attack: X
  • Look in angle: E
  • Shield: F
  • Pause: Escape/P
  • Use surrounding - Buy: V
  • Change Weapons: Number keys
  • Inventory: I
